content:
@Dimitri Szabo I'm looking at #10217 because it's in your wishlist for 6.4 but I don't understand very well what you want.

It sounds like you want to reuse Server Name values over and over. Is that right? So maybe it would be a dropdown instead of a free text field like you're showing in the mockup?
Do you mean a dropdown list including Server names already entered for other Harvesting Clients ?

What we want is to be able to indicate the repository or catalog that has been harvested (source). We do want to be able to reuse this name because a single source can have several clients in order to dispatch its datasets in various dataverse collections
A dropdown list is a nice idea to reuse the values, my concern with it is how a non technical admin would add a new value in this list the first time

Here's a quick visualisation , hope it helps
image.png
Ok, makes sense. I added a "related discussion" link to the issue so people can read what we wrote here in Zulip for more info. Thanks!
